intro: Krynitzkia obovata, commonly known as the broad-ovate krynitzkia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its broad, ovate-shaped leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Krynitzkia obovata is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
